response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for $100. This is a special opportunity to acquire the product at a price slightly above its manufacturing cost but significantly below the market value of $120. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you're interested.", "product_price": 100}
